description:
Unable to stand being treated by a child by Haru, Ren leaves the house. Natsuo agrees to let Ren stay over when he suddenly shows up at his apartment, but Haru shows up just as he`s about to grant Ren`s request to do something that he "can`t tell Haru about." Haru tells  Ren to not come home ever again, but...?
Source: crunchyroll
